\subsection{\textcolor{Chapter }{GIS (for IsMusicalSpace, IsGroup, IsFunction)}}
\logpage{[ 1, 1, 1 ]}\nobreak
\hyperdef{L}{X7DC1F0277DCBEA3D}{}
{\noindent\textcolor{FuncColor}{$\triangleright$\enspace\texttt{GIS({\mdseries\slshape S, IVLS, int})\index{GIS@\texttt{GIS}!for IsMusicalSpace, IsGroup, IsFunction}
\label{GIS:for IsMusicalSpace, IsGroup, IsFunction}
}\hfill{\scriptsize (operation)}}\\


 A Generalized Interval System ($GIS$) is an ordered triple (\mbox{\texttt{\mdseries\slshape S}}, \mbox{\texttt{\mdseries\slshape IVLS}}, \mbox{\texttt{\mdseries\slshape int}}), where the space \mbox{\texttt{\mdseries\slshape S}} of the $GIS$ is a set of elements (satisfying $IsObject$), the set \mbox{\texttt{\mdseries\slshape IVLS}} of intervals for the $GIS$ is a group in the mathematical sense (satisfying $IsGroup$), and \mbox{\texttt{\mdseries\slshape int}} is a function from \mbox{\texttt{\mdseries\slshape S}} x \mbox{\texttt{\mdseries\slshape S}} into \mbox{\texttt{\mdseries\slshape IVLS}} such that... }

 }

\subsection{\textcolor{Chapter }{GISInt (for IsGIS, IsObject, IsObject)}}
\logpage{[ 1, 2, 1 ]}\nobreak
\hyperdef{L}{X7D0EC84681261F64}{}
{\noindent\textcolor{FuncColor}{$\triangleright$\enspace\texttt{GISInt({\mdseries\slshape GIS, s, t})\index{GISInt@\texttt{GISInt}!for IsGIS, IsObject, IsObject}
\label{GISInt:for IsGIS, IsObject, IsObject}
}\hfill{\scriptsize (operation)}}\\


 $\forall s, t \in S,\;int(s, t)$ where \mbox{\texttt{\mdseries\slshape gis}} $ = (S, IVLS, int)$ }

 }

 
\section{\textcolor{Chapter }{Predefined GIS}}\label{Chapter_GIS_Section_Predefined_GIS}
\logpage{[ 1, 3, 0 ]}
\hyperdef{L}{X8595FC728794EB52}{}
{
  

\subsection{\textcolor{Chapter }{PSpace}}
\logpage{[ 1, 3, 1 ]}\nobreak
\hyperdef{L}{X7D4BB96C8351E9D6}{}
{\noindent\textcolor{FuncColor}{$\triangleright$\enspace\texttt{PSpace\index{PSpace@\texttt{PSpace}}
\label{PSpace}
}\hfill{\scriptsize (global variable)}}\\


 $(\mathbb{Z}, (\mathbb{Z},{+}), int)$ where $int{:}\mathbb{Z}{\times}\mathbb{Z}{\to}\mathbb{Z}$ and $int(s,t) = t-s$. }

 

\subsection{\textcolor{Chapter }{PCSpace}}
\logpage{[ 1, 3, 2 ]}\nobreak
\hyperdef{L}{X826B96F087B008B7}{}
{\noindent\textcolor{FuncColor}{$\triangleright$\enspace\texttt{PCSpace\index{PCSpace@\texttt{PCSpace}}
\label{PCSpace}
}\hfill{\scriptsize (global variable)}}\\


 $(\mathbb{Z}_{12}, (\mathbb{Z}_{12},{+}), int)$ where $int{:}\mathbb{Z}_{12}{\times}\mathbb{Z}_{12}{\to}\mathbb{Z}_{12}$ and $int(s,t) = (t-s)\mod 12$. }

 }

 }
